content.question: The document is best understood in the context of which of the following global developments after 1900 ?

choices.label: Growing demands in many countries that women be given the right to vote
Greater freedom of women to make professional and personal choices
Women taking on industrial jobs previously done by men during times of war
Widening disparities in the opportunities available to middle-class and working-class women

content.answer: Greater freedom of women to make professional and personal choices

topic.text: 9.5: Calls for Reform and Responses after 1900

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
